Talk_1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Happy_01>Aaah! <sp:5:0:0>Really? You have them?


With your fireflies and some I've also
collected, I can attract even MORE
fireflies, and then...
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>I can make the glowiest of glowing trees.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Um...<sp:5:0:0>while you're helping, can you do
me one more favor?
Talk_1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ah well.<sp:5:0:0> Catching sunset fireflies is hard.


<sp:3:0:2:0501>I really need to gather all of those sunset
fireflies soon so I can show Haite that
glowing tree...
Talk_1080:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Sad>Um,<sp:5:0:0> it's raining.<sp:5:0:0> Whatever we're up to,
let's do it some other time, OK?
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:QuestionNormal>Hiya there!


You climbed up here again. So, what's it
about this time?

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Maybe you want to hear <clr:0000>what happened<clr:ffff>
after all.<sp:5:0:0> Or maybe you came back to hear
more of my performance?
Talk_1032_01:
This will only work once the fireflies start
glowing. So I'd like you to <clr:0000>bring<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Haite<clr:ffff> to
this spot <clr:0000>once night falls<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1081:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> I'd give you a <clr:0000>big hearty truffle<clr:ffff> as
thanks, but looks like you can't carry
anything more.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Let's talk again when you've made some
space.<sp:5:0:0> I want to thank you right!
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hiya! So, I bet you climbed up here with
me for some good reason.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Need something?<sp:5:1:0> Oh, wait.<sp:5:0:0> I know...


<sp:3:0:2:0101>You heard <clr:0000>what happened<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0> Uh, but
maybe you just want to hear me play!
Talk_1032_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>This will only work when the fireflies are
glowing. So I'd like you to <clr:0000>bring<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Haite<clr:ffff> to
this spot <clr:0000>while it's still dark<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1082:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>I want to thank you for all your help, and
thought you'd like a <clr:0000>big hearty truffle<clr:ffff>.
Make some space and it's yours!
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:LaughS>Hiya again!<sp:5:0:0> I guess you DO want to know
<clr:0000>what happened<clr:ffff>...
Talk_1032_03:
If you don't have time, bring her <clr:0000>on a
different night<clr:ffff> instead.
Talk_1083:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>You made space in your pouch? Then
here's that thank-you gift!
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hiya! So, I bet you climbed up here with
me for some good reason.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Need something?<sp:5:0:0> Or, hey, did you come
to listen to my performance?
Talk_1032_04:
If Haite's sleeping,<sp:5:0:0> bring her <clr:0000>on a
different night<clr:ffff> instead.
Talk_1084:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:SurpriseM_01>*yawn*<sp:5:0:0> I'm heading back inside to get a
little sleep. Almost daytime!
Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:LaughS>Hiya again!<sp:5:0:0> Need something from me
after all?
Talk_1032_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>Oh! And I want it to be a big surprise!
You'll give it away if you say I'm working
on this.<sp:5:0:0> OK, see you both later!
Talk_1085:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>Hmm?<sp:5:1:0> Who's that down there?<sp:5:0:0> Climb up
the tree if you want to talk to me!
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:QuestionNormal>Hiya there! 


You climbed up here again. So, what's it
about this time?

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Need something?<sp:5:0:0> Or, hey, did you come
to listen to my performance?
Talk_1052:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_01>Happy...<sp:5:0:0> Did you hear that?


<sp:3:0:2:0100>Yep, <sp:5:0:0>finally happy.


What a relief.<sp:5:0:0> I knew there was a bright
smile in there somewhere. Good for Haite.
Talk_1053:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Oh... I guess you haven't heard of us.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>The Stable Trotters troupe performs music
at stables all over the place. I used to play
the flute with them.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>But I left because I wanted to spend time
with Haite.
Talk_1054:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>The Stable Trotters are getting everyone
back together? <sp:5:0:0>Really?

Then I've got to find them! No time
to waste!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>I've got to do my part to make everyone
feel a lot better these days—bright smiles
for all!
Talk_1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>I'm going to use <clr:0000>sunset fireflies<clr:ffff> to make
that glowing tree.

That'll definitely make Haite happy!
Talk_1055:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I've wondered how Mastro and the other
musicians are doing, wherever they all are
these days...
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I heard that Mastro is at <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff>.
I'd love to put on fun performances in
his troupe again.
Talk_1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Hmm... <sp:5:0:0>They glow <clr:0000>after night falls<clr:ffff>, so
they aren't hard to spot.

I haven't seen any around the
stable though.

I've definitely heard that there are a lot
around the <clr:0000>deep forest to the north<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal_00>But which way is north from here?<sp:5:0:0> Maps
aren't really my specialty.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, about those fireflies! They'll fly away
if they hear you, so sneak up to them.

Finding them isn't the hard part. I'm
bad at being quiet!
Talk_1056:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Well, anyway, thanks a lot!


You helped me with all sorts of stuff, so
you can have this if you want it.
Talk_1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>With <clr:0000>10<clr:ffff> more of those <clr:0000>sunset fireflies<clr:ffff>,
I'm sure I could attract way more of them
to the tree to make it glow!
If you talk to the guy selling stuff from
his wagon, <sp:5:0:0>he might have some fireflies
for you.
Talk_1057:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm heading out soon.


<sp:3:0:2:0801>If we meet again somewhere, my music
is gonna make you grin from ear to ear!
Talk_1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>I really need to gather all of those
<clr:0000>sunset fireflies<clr:ffff> so I can show Haite
that glowing tree...
Talk_1058:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The weather's bad tonight.<sp:5:0:0> We should
really do this on a nice evening.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>So, <clr:0000>bring<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Haite<clr:ffff> right here <clr:0000>after night falls<clr:ffff>,
but only if the <clr:0000>weather is good<clr:ffff>!
Talk_1059:
This is so much prettier than the one I
once saw in a book!

It's just like I see it in my dreams!
Talk_1070:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm going to play here a bit longer.


<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'd like to play with the Stable Trotters
again someday. That'd make Haite smile.
Everyone else too!
Talk_1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I would still like to surprise her with a
"glowing tree" somehow, but safely.

So, now I'm collecting fireflies.


<sp:3:0:2:0101>I need only <clr:0000>10<clr:ffff> more <clr:0000>sunset fireflies<clr:ffff>, and
then I'll have enough to make a whole
tree glow.
That will make Haite smile!<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>All right!<sp:5:0:0> You look like you could use
a smile.<sp:0:4:0>So just for you, I'll put on one of my
finest performances!
Talk_1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Hmm... <sp:5:0:0>I think it's hard to find any
around the stable.

They <clr:0000>glow as they fly<clr:ffff> at night, so they're
easy to spot now, wherever they are.

I've definitely heard that there are a lot
around the <clr:0000>deep forest to the north<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal_00>But which way is north from here?<sp:5:0:0> Maps
aren't really my specialty.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, about those fireflies! They'll fly away
if they hear you, so sneak up to them.

<sp:3:0:2:0301>Finding them isn't the hard part. I'm bad
at being quiet!
Talk_1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm going to make this tree glow with
the fireflies.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>So, <clr:0000>bring<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Haite<clr:ffff> right here <clr:0000>after night falls<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
I really appreciate it!
0008: I want to hear you play.
Talk_1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've got the fireflies in place for the
glowing tree!

Could you <clr:0000>bring<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Haite right here<clr:ffff> for the
big surprise?
Talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive_01>What happened...<sp:5:0:0>not that you probably
haven't heard already...<sp:5:0:0>is that there was
a fire in the field.
Yeah, right on this spot.<sp:5:0:0> This burned
patch around us. There were some
flowers here before.
It was all my fault.<sp:5:0:0> An accident, but still
my fault.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>You see, I have a friend who lives at this
stable. Her name's Haite.<sp:5:0:0> Maybe you've
met her?<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701>She's been asking people if she could see
a "glowing tree." It's just something from
a picture book.
You know...<sp:5:0:0>it's not real. But she really,
really wishes it was. I promised her that
I'd show her one!
Not my brightest idea,<sp:5:0:0> uh,<sp:5:0:0> given they
don't exist. And then I was stuck.

So...I thought I'd use just a little tree...
and a little fire...and make a "glowing
tree." Really quick, that's all.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>That's how things got burned here, but I
was only thinking of my promise to Haite.
Besides...<sp:5:0:0>it didn't even work.
Talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:QuestionNormal>Fine, I'll tell you...


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I guessed that's what you came to talk
about...<sp:5:0:0>but I wish it was about just
wanting to hear me play.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Let's get it over with.<sp:5:0:0> But how about we
move it down there where it's safer.
Talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>So you want to hear about that, huh?<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Let's get it over with.<sp:5:0:0> But how about we
move it down there where it's safer.
Talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive_01>You might hear about this from someone
at the stable. But what happened...<sp:5:0:0>is that
there was a fire in the field.
Yeah, right on this spot.<sp:5:0:0> This burned
patch around us. There were some
flowers here before.
It was all my fault.<sp:5:0:0> An accident, but still
my fault.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>You see, I have a friend who lives at this
stable.<sp:5:0:0> Her name's Haite. Maybe you've
met her?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>She's been asking people if she could see
a "glowing tree." It's just something from
a picture book.
You know...<sp:5:0:0>it's not real. But she really,
really wishes it was. I promised her that
I'd show her one!
Not my brightest idea,<sp:5:0:0> uh,<sp:5:0:0> given they
don't exist. And then I was stuck.

So...I thought I'd use just a little tree...
and a little fire...and make a "glowing
tree." Really quick, that's all.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>That's how things got burned here, but I
was only thinking of my promise to Haite.
Besides...<sp:5:0:0>it didn't even work.
Talk_1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Wow!<sp:5:0:0> The troupe is touring again?<sp:5:0:0> And
they want all of us musicians back?
That's great!
<sp:3:0:2:0501>But...<sp:5:1:0>first I have something to do here.


I can't go back to the Stable Trotters
until I take care of it.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Come on. Let's move this down there
where it's safer. I need to tell you...<sp:5:0:0>
what happened here.
Talk_1061:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Thank you.


I saw the best glowing tree ever...
Talk_1063:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>But it's going to take more than that to
keep her smiling.<sp:5:0:0> I need to do what I can
to make sure that happens...
Talk_1064:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I've figured it out.<sp:5:0:0> I'm going back to
the <clr:0000>Stable Trotters<clr:ffff>!

I'll get better and better at playing my
flute. More fun, more amazing! <sp:5:0:0>Because
if the crowds love my music...
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>then Haite will too, and she'll always
smile when she hears it.
Near_1003: I still have to thank you!
Talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh?! <sp:5:0:0>Do you...<sp:5:0:0>do you have some fireflies
with you?<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure I see a glow coming
from your pouch.
I need <clr:0000>10<clr:ffff> more of those <clr:0000>sunset fireflies<clr:ffff>
to make that glowing tree!
Talk_1065:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>You've actually heard of the
Stable Trotters?

I'm surprised.<sp:5:0:0> The last time I saw them,
they were barely drawing crowds. I didn't
think anyone liked their music anymore.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I used to be in the Stable Trotters, and
played flute in the troupe.

But I gave all that up...


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Because I wanted to spend lots of time
with Haite.
Talk_1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh?! <sp:5:0:0>Do you...<sp:5:0:0>do you have some fireflies
with you?<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure I see a glow coming
from your pouch.
I need <clr:0000>10<clr:ffff> more of those <clr:0000>sunset fireflies<clr:ffff>
to make that glowing tree!
